name: Keep'n It Alive WebGL version
description:
Play as Inferno Joe as you challenge the Disco Aliens to a dance off for the fate of the planet!

1 button rhythm game.....

God help us all!

1 Button, the fire button (Ctrl on keyboard, left click on mouse, or one of them buttons on the gamepad).

Good luck.

This was my entry into Ludum Dare 46 - "Keep It Alive" was the theme.  See that page here:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$181883

There is a downloadable zip file located here: https://ifman1.itch.io/keepn-it-alive if you can't play this in the browser for some reason.
